annotations.description: The Florentine was first created by Sam Ross at Attaboy in New York City around 2017. For those of you who don't know, Attaboy is the bar Ross opened in the ...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Florentine

textContent:
1oz (30ml)  Cynar
1oz (30ml) Dry Vermouth
1oz (30ml) Cocchi Americano
Orange Twist

Build in glass over large cube

title: Florentine
